name: Kampung
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Production] for each adjacent [Fishing Boats]
Cannot be built on [Coast] tiles <with [0] to [0] neighboring [Water resource] tiles>

name: Idendo
uniques: Cannot be built on [Land] tiles <with [0] to [0] neighboring [Luxury resource] tiles>
Cannot be built on [Land] tiles <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Idendo] tiles>

name: Jolopong
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Production] for each adjacent [Jolopong] <after discovering [Industrialization]>
Cannot be built on [Water] tiles <with [0] to [2] neighboring [Land] tiles>
Cannot be built on [Water resource] tiles
